summary:
Weapon of mass destruction!!!
Never see another enemy, walk peacefully through dungeons collecting treasure and items, help allies without fear of friendly fire!
descriptionHtml:
Weapon of mass destruction!!!   Never see another enemy, walk peacefully through dungeons collecting treasure and items, help allies without fear of friendly fire!(see note 1)
Way over powered experiment, mostly just souped up Ebony Mail but kills any hostile within the cell you're in, painfully (they scream as they die :))
can be found in the Warden's chest in Helgen, the potion barrel in Helgen, the chest in your player's Home, and a few chests around the game, is also craftable at a forge with the Ebony perk.
Very handy to just keep in your inventory if you use a fast travel from indoors mod for when you get "you cannot fast travel when enemies are near" just put on the Armor of Death and wait for the screams to stop, then put your regular armor back on and travel.

Note 1: for some reason if you join the Stormcloaks and you use it on their quests it kills them and they try to kill you, so it can't be used during Stormcloak quests.

Try my other Mod - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83890/?
author: dber1962
